original_solution_mapping.L1: At least one person lives in 85/100 * 120 = <<85/100*120=102>>102 apartments.
original_solution_mapping.L2: At least two persons live in 60/100 * 120 = <<60/100*120=72>>72 apartments.
original_solution_mapping.L3: So in every of the 102 - 72 = <<30*1=30>>30 apartments, only one person is living.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1039.
    Returns: the number of apartments with only one resident.
    """
    # L1
    at_least_one_percent = Fraction(85, 100) # 85% of them have at least 1 resident
    total_apartments = 120 # 120 apartments
    apartments_with_at_least_one = at_least_one_percent * total_apartments

    # L2
    at_least_two_percent = Fraction(60, 100) # 60% of the apartments have at least two residents
    apartments_with_at_least_two = at_least_two_percent * total_apartments

    # L3
    intermediate_difference = apartments_with_at_least_one - apartments_with_at_least_two
    one_multiplier = 1 # WK
    apartments_with_only_one = intermediate_difference * one_multiplier

    # FA
    answer = apartments_with_only_one
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: At least one person lives in {at_least_one_percent} * {total_apartments} = <<{at_least_one_percent}*{total_apartments}={apartments_with_at_least_one}>>{apartments_with_at_least_one} apartments.
At least two persons live in {at_least_two_percent} * {total_apartments} = <<{at_least_two_percent}*{total_apartments}={apartments_with_at_least_two}>>{apartments_with_at_least_two} apartments.

So in every of the {apartments_with_at_least_one} - {apartments_with_at_least_two} = <<{intermediate_difference}*{one_multiplier}={apartments_with_only_one}>>{apartments_with_only_one} apartments, only one person is living.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: At least one person lives in 85/100 * 120 = <<85/100*120=2417/20>>2417/20 apartments.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: At least two persons live in 60/100 * 120 = <<60/100*120=72>>72 apartments.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: So in every of the 2417/20 - 72 = <<977/20*1=977/20>>977/20 apartments, only one person is living.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '+' instead.
